messages.content: What's the best way to cook an egg?
Scrambled, over easy, or made into an omelette? There are so many ways to cook an egg!
How long does it take to boil an egg?
The answer depends on the size of the egg and personal preference. Generally, 10-12 minutes for large eggs!
What's the best way to cook a steak?
Grill, broil, or pan-fry? There are so many ways to cook a steak!
How long does it take to cook a steak?
The answer depends on the size of the steak and personal preference. Generally, 10-12 minutes for large steaks!
What's the best way to cook a chicken?
Grill, broil, or pan-fry? There are so many ways to cook a chicken!
How long does it take to cook a chicken?
The answer depends on the size of the chicken and personal preference. Generally, 10-12 minutes for large chickens!
What's the best way to cook a fish?
Grill, broil, or pan-fry? There are so many ways to cook a fish!
